title: stuck in a champion selection
body:
Im stuck in a champion selection. please help us riot
my game id is ryanlad
server is oce

help asap!!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=ryanlad,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=uJGVRzxc,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-04-21T23:21:24.557+0000)
>
> Im stuck in a champion selection. please help us riot
> my game id is ryanlad
> server is oce
> 
> help asap!!

they won't help you cause they cannot break ranked rules even if it is Riots fault. Once in a while they give you draw and that only happens if too many people pressure Riot letting them its their fault. As of their server are frucked so don't play ranked cause they wont give you a draw.

my team mates afked in 5 of 10 of my promos games cause of Riots fault and  it totally frucked up my mmr and my placement. So I lost 5 games of 10 promos games purely of Riots fault and afk/dced teammates. 

Good Job Riot, and you won't even give a draw.
